pr_title: Update TESTING.asciidoc for recent REST test changes

timeline.bodyText: Why are we adding --info logging? This seems unnecessary?
timeline.author: rjernst
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -308,20 +308,19 @@ The REST tests are run automatically when executing the "./gradlew check" comman
 YAML REST tests use the following command (modules and plugins may also include YAML REST tests):
 
 ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
-./gradlew :rest-api-spec:yamlRestTest
+./gradlew :rest-api-spec:yamlRestTest --info

replies.bodyText:
Minor preference so that it shows the individual tests that are executing vs. just a test counter counting up. I don't have a strong preference, but have found myself always using --info for rest tests.
I'll defer to your preference @rjernst and remove the --info.
replies.author: jakelandis
